variable.name: INVSITE
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the site (for internal use)

variable.name: INV
variable.comment: Numeric code identifying the investigator (for internal use)

variable.name: GE1
variable.comment: FAMS - EMOTIONAL WELL-BEING By selecting one (1) per line, please indicate how true each statement has been for you during the past 7 days.
